apple.name: Apple
steps: Harvest when apples turn red and firm

arecanut.name: Arecanut
steps: Plant seedlings in pits with compost
Provide partial shade in early stages

bittergourd.name: Bitter Gourd
steps: Sow seeds 1-2 cm deep in raised beds
Harvest when fruits are green and firm

blackgram.name: Black Gram
steps: Water regularly but avoid excess moisture

bottlegourd.name: Bottle Gourd
steps: Sow seeds in pits or trellises

brinjal.name: Brinjal (Eggplant)
steps: Sow seeds in nursery, transplant later

grapes.name: Grapes
steps: Harvest when grapes are fully ripened

maize.name: Maize
steps: Prepare soil by plowing and adding manure
Sow seeds at a depth of 3-5 cm
Use Nitrogen, Phosphorus, and Potassium fertilizers
Protect from pests like Fall Armyworm

mothbeans.name: Moth Beans
steps: Water sparsely as it is drought-resistant

muskmelon.name: Muskmelon
steps: Harvest when fruits are fragrant and firm

orange.name: Orange
steps: Harvest when oranges are fully ripened

rice.name: Rice
steps: Apply fertilizers like Urea and DAP

sunflower.name: Sunflower
steps: Harvest when back of head turns yellow

watermelon.name: Watermelon
steps: Harvest when rind is firm and dull
